summary: Comprehensive unit‑test suite for the Kedro CLI command that creates new projects. It validates parsing of command‑line options, handling of configuration files and interactive prompts, compatibility checks between Kedro and starter template versions, tool and example selection logic, telemetry flag processing, and error handling for invalid starter specifications or repository cloning.
business_intent: Ensure the Kedro project‑creation workflow works reliably across different user inputs and environments, preventing regressions and guaranteeing correct validation, version compatibility, and user experience when initializing new Kedro projects.
